vacancies.title: Maths Teacher
vacancies.headline: We are looking to recruit a Maths Teacher at a school where staff and students work together to create an inviting and purposeful atmosphere.
vacancies.description: Mark and assess students' work on a regular basis in accordance with the school's marking and assessment policy. Set and mark homework in accordance with school policy and departmental guidelines. Attend staff, departmental and other meetings as required. Liaise effectively with parents or carers on students’ progress and achievements.
vacancies.education_requirements: Bachelor of Education / PGCE / or equivalent teaching degree.
vacancies.experience_requirements: Proven experience teaching the UK curriculum, NQTs and/or OS-trained teachers welcome to apply.

vacancies.title: Year 5 Teacher
vacancies.headline: We are recruiting a Year 5 Teacher / KS2 Teacher to join a vibrant and popular primary school in Surrey. This is a full time classroom teaching position available from September 2017 and it will be contracted for the full academic year. There is a possibility that it will turn into a permanent position.
vacancies.description: Mark and assess students' work on a regular basis in accordance with the school's marking and assessment policy. Set and mark homework in accordance with school policy and departmental guidelines. Attend staff, departmental and other meetings as required. Liaise effectively with parents or carers on students’ progress and achievements.
vacancies.education_requirements: Bachelor of Education / PGCE / or equivalent teaching degree.
vacancies.experience_requirements: Proven experience teaching the UK curriculum, NQTs and/or OS-trained teachers welcome to apply.

vacancies.title: Primary Teacher - SEMH Specialist
vacancies.headline: We are currently looking to recruit a passionate and experienced Teacher to join our team in Beaways School, Surrey. The Teacher will be working in our outstanding independent day school based in Farnham
vacancies.description: Mark and assess students' work on a regular basis in accordance with the school's marking and assessment policy. Set and mark homework in accordance with school policy and departmental guidelines. Attend staff, departmental and other meetings as required. vacancies.experience_requirements: Proven experience teaching the UK curriculum, NQTs and/or OS-trained teachers welcome to apply.

vacancies.title: KS2 Teacher
vacancies.headline: We are looking for an excellent practitioner to join our dynamic Key Stage 2 team. In September 2013 we expanded to two forms of entry with each year group having a bilingual class and an English-only class.
vacancies.description: Mark and assess students' work on a regular basis in accordance with the school's marking and assessment policy. Set and mark homework in accordance with school policy and departmental guidelines. Attend staff, departmental and other meetings as required. Liaise effectively with parents or carers on students’ progress and achievements.
vacancies.education_requirements: Bachelor of Education / PGCE / or equivalent teaching degree.
vacancies.experience_requirements: Proven experience teaching the UK curriculum, NQTs and/or OS-trained teachers welcome to apply.

vacancies.title: Class teacher KS1
vacancies.headline: We are looking to recruit an enthusiastic Key Stage 1 class teacher to join our leading academy
vacancies.description: The Class Teacher will: Teach a class of pupils and ensure that planning, preparation, recording, assessment and reporting meet their varying learning and social needs. Maintain the positive ethos and core values of the academy, both inside and outside the classroom. Contribute to constructive team building among teaching and non-teaching staff, parents and governors. We actively encourage and welcome visits to our academy and I know you will be impressed with what you see
vacancies.education_requirements: Bachelor of Education / PGCE / or equivalent teaching degree.
vacancies.experience_requirements: Proven experience teaching Key Stage 1 or 2, NQTs and/or OS-trained teachers welcome to apply.

vacancies.title: Class teacher KS2
vacancies.headline: The Governors of Rayley Mills Primary School are seeking to appoint a teacher for a year 4 class
vacancies.description: Rayley Mills is larger than average primary school; it became three form entry three years ago and is growing year on year. The school had an OFSTED inspection in 2012 and was judged to be ‘Good’, from then steady improvements have been made. We have a very enthusiastic team of teachers and support staff who are committed to improving outcomes for the local children. A beautiful extension was opened in September 2013 and extensive improvements were made to the outdoor areas. I recommend any interested candidates to come and visit us for an informal tour and to meet our delightful children.
vacancies.education_requirements: Bachelor of Education / PGCE / or equivalent teaching degree.
vacancies.experience_requirements: Proven experience teaching the UK curriculum, NQTs and/or OS-trained teachers welcome to apply.

vacancies.title: Primary Teacher
vacancies.headline: We are looking to appoint an enthusiastic professional, who is committed to improving the lives of Key Stage 1 children.
vacancies.description: Has experience of supporting young people. Has knowledge of the national curriculum and Early Years Framework. Holds a PGCE or QTS in Primary Teaching. Has excellent communication, organisational and interpersonal skills.
vacancies.education_requirements: Bachelor of Education / PGCE / or equivalent teaching degree.
vacancies.experience_requirements: Proven experience teaching the UK curriculum, NQTs and/or OS-trained teachers welcome to apply.

vacancies.title: Business Studies Teacher
vacancies.headline: We are looking to recruit an enthusiastic teacher of Business Studies to join our large and successful department.
vacancies.description: Enthusiastic business studies teacher required to share that passion and inspire students. The ability to teach ICT and Computing is desirable but not essential. This position would suit either an NQT or an experienced teacher.
vacancies.education_requirements: Bachelor of Education / PGCE / or equivalent teaching degree.
vacancies.experience_requirements: Proven experience teaching the UK curriculum, NQTs and/or OS-trained teachers welcome to apply.

kent-1.name: Landwood School
kent-1.description: Landwood School is a large school with 1175 students in KS3, KS4 and Sixth Form. Achieving excellence is at the heart of everything that we do across our curriculum and within our pastoral care of our students.

surrey-1.name: Acme Primary School
surrey-1.description: We can offer a strong team, first class training, dedicated and professional colleagues and the chance of rapid progression.  Acme Primary School is 3-form entry and is graded outstanding by Ofsted.

surrey-2.name: Beaways School
surrey-2.description: At Beaways our students benefit from our unique, bespoke creative curriculum with strategic support from multidisciplinary teams of therapists, and we are looking for the next member of our teaching team to enhance their learning experience.

surrey-3.name: Vine Lane School
surrey-3.description: The well being, achievement and progress of each child is our highest priority. We have developed Rights Respecting values and an understanding of global citizenship as the core of how we learn together. Through achieving an understanding of the United Nations Convention Rights of the Child we are able to work together to develop mutual respect and a positive learning environment. It enables our pupils to make sense of their place in the world and their local community.

poole-1.name: Sandpoole Academy
poole-1.description: The Sandpoole Academy is located in a peaceful, rural location. We are a fantastic academy with an enormous amount of potential and believe that this position is an excellent opportunity for the right person to gain experience in a rapidly developing environment.
